dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5334 IH: Essex National Heritage Area Permanency Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Moulton (for himself and Ms. Tsongas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To repeal the funding authorization sunset and the total funding cap for the Essex National Heritage Area.

subsection.text: This Act may be cited as the Essex National Heritage Area Permanency Act.
Section 507 of division II of the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 (Public Law 104–333) is repealed.
Section 508(a) of division II of the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 (Public Law 104–333) is amended by striking the last sentence.
